rule_text: Attained_Age <= 78.5 AND Attained_Age <= 69.5 AND Attained_Age > 60.5 AND Smoker_Status <= 0.5 AND Duration <= 19.5 AND Face_Amount_Band <= 3.5

interpretation.risk: Mortality is 0.65x the population average (34.5% lower).
interpretation.model: Model is calibrated for this segment (A/E=1.03).
